body.description: The Chill Out Heat Relief Kit by Be Smart Get Prepared, 21 pieces is designed to help you stay cool and overcome the symptoms of heat stress. This first aid kit provides treatments for heat exhaustion, dehydration, bruises, and muscle cramps. Included are U.S. Coast Guard approved emergency water, electrolytes, a thermometer, and multiple cooling solutions to reduce the heat. The soft, nylon material allows for this kit to fit easily inside of a larger backpack. From the leading and trusted manufacturer of first aid kits in the USA, Total Resources International. TREAT (10) Electrolyte Tablets 5 packs (2) Instant Cold Compresses 5 in x 6 in (2) Instant Cool Patches 2 in x 4.80 in PROTECT (2) Cohesive Wraps 1 in x 90 in (2 yd 1 1/2 ft) ESSENTIALS (2) Forehead Thermometers EMERGENCY ESSENTIALS (3) Emergency Waters 4.22 fl oz

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars a very good kit at a very good price
reviews.reviewText: I can't say how good they bag itself is as far as being water resistant since I've only just recently received it, I can say that in my opinion it's a very good kit because it contains important items to prevent having a heat stroke and to really help you if you do become over heated or dehydrated, plus there's some extra room in the 3 little mesh pockets so that you can add some more small items to your kit, which is nice, I would certainly recommend this kit to anyone who works outdoors during warm months, who hikes, walks, rides a bike, jogs, etc. it's always better to be safe than sorry!
